alerts.description:
* WHAT...Dangerous rip currents are expected.

* WHERE...In Alabama, Baldwin Coastal and Mobile Coastal
Counties. In Florida, Santa Rosa Coastal, Okaloosa Coastal and
Escambia Coastal Counties.

* WHEN...Now through late tonight.

* IMPACTS...Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away
from shore into deeper water.
alerts.title: Rip Current Statement issued March 29 at 12:07PM CDT until March 30 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS Mobile AL
